0: Newt Gingrich has lost his last embedded print reporters, reporters on the trail confirm. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The last two print reporters covering Gingrich full-time on the trail -- from POLITICO and the Atlanta Journal Constitution -- pulled out on Friday. The Associated Press pulled its embed after Tuesday's Illinois primary. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR (Also on POLITICO: GOP race nears tipping point) NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR These and other print outlets will continue to cover Gingrich on occasion, but the sustained traveling press has been reduced to the television networks, which will remain.
